data.title: Third Degree Glass Factory
data.meta_description: Third Degree Glass Factory is a partner of Explore St Louis. Contact Travel and tourism ranks among the top 7 industries in St. Louis City and County.
data.text:
TripAdvisor Rating:

29 Reviews | Write a Review

Book Third Degree Glass Factory while you still can!

Reviewed By kaitlynlouises

Third Degree Glass Factory (TDGF) was a beautiful venue and a space that my husband and I would 100% recommend for a wedding reception! When we first began looking at venues in the St. Louis area...

Full Review

Third Friday Event

Reviewed By wilsonStLouis

Awesome demonstration of glass blowing and explanations about each step of the process. Friendly and very educated glass artisans. Audience has up close viewing but if you prefer, it is also being...

Full Review

Small Event Success

Reviewed By Haber218

We held an event there in February 2020. The staff was great to work with in the pre-planning stages, and the art filled atmosphere is super impressive. Would recommend to anyone for an event.

Full Review
